content: this legal document is a mutual rights arrangement between two parties involved in a divorce case the parties have agreed to end their marriage and have provided a detailed statement of their assets debts and agreements regarding their child and other children involved they have agreed on the division of property including clothing household items financial accounts and life insurance policies they have also addressed their debts including a mortgage and rental agreement the document outlines the arrangements for custody and property management involving the children including decisions regarding education health and residence it also discusses the allocation of expenses and the establishment of a joint bank account for extraordinary costs the document explains the legal obligations of parents to provide for their children and the possibility of reviewing arrangements in the event of new circumstances it mentions the option of authorizing direct payment of child maintenance and the involvement of a government agency to recover unpaid maintenance the document also explains the process for property settlements after divorce including the division of assets and debts it discusses the consequences of the divorce on marriage and divorce certificates and the retroactive effect on property from the date of separation the document specifies the jurisdiction for divorce proceedings and the obligation to inform the notary and fulfill any conditions imposed it mentions the option to consult the document online and concludes with the signatures of the parties
